skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zoya office
des:
Zoya is your one stop business solution.

Using Zoya you can connect to Zyk, SalesForce, Asana, QuickBooks, Shopify and can query on the go.

Huge stack of applications like CRM, Tasks, Payments, Shop, Invoice, Accounting, LiveChat, Helpdesk(Ticketing solution)

Connect to your Tasks/CRM by simply saying :
- My tasks/leads
- My overdue tasks/leads
- Tasks/Leads assigned to <TeamMate Name>
- Tasks/Leads in project <Project Name>
- Tasks/Leads with status NEW/CLOSED/ACTIVE
- Add comment on Task/Lead



Check all the applications at zoya.ai.

*Coming Soon*
Integrations to SalesForce, Asana, Shopify, QuickBooks
